name: Ooze Squared
description:
Controls:

Red Ooze: WASD for moving and jumping, left shift to reset

Blue Ooze: Arrow keys for moving and jumping, right shift to reset

Description: Oozes Red & Blue have a very important job in the dungeon, cleaning up dangerous chemicals left by monsters and adventurers! Work together to collect your respective chemicals (color) and use the pipes to reach the next level. Teamwork is the key!

Credits:

One who made the game: Me!
